channel.title: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik and RTV Slovenija, 12–14 June 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 24–33 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 10–16 seats
  • Socialni demokrati: 8–13 seats
  • Stranka modernega centra: 8–13 seats
  • Levica: 7–12 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 0–4 seats
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 0–6 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 0–5 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 0–5 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik and RTV Slovenija, 12–14 June 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for Dnevnik and RTV Slovenija, 12–14 June 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 25.8–33.1%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 11.0–16.5%
  • Socialni demokrati: 8.4–13.4%
  • Stranka modernega centra: 8.4–13.4%
  • Levica: 8.1–13.0%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 2.4–5.5%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 3.1–6.5%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 2.4–5.5%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 2.7–5.9%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Parsifal SC for Nova24TV, 5–6 June 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 25–33 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 12–18 seats
  • Socialni demokrati: 8–14 seats
  • Stranka modernega centra: 5–9 seats
  • Levica: 7–12 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 3–7 seats
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 0–6 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 0 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 0–6 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Parsifal SC for Nova24TV, 5–6 June 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Parsifal SC for Nova24TV, 5–6 June 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 27.3–35.3%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 13.6–20.1%
  • Socialni demokrati: 9.5–15.2%
  • Stranka modernega centra: 5.5–10.1%
  • Levica: 7.9–13.2%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 4.2–8.3%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 3.2–7.0%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 0.8–3.1%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 3.0–6.7%
